column4: actually, there is a site i cant access with firefox, even though i have the plugins
i think linux is in danger of being too divergent with all its packages
like, it takes too much effort to maintain one particular distro
but ubuntu is probably the best ive seen
uninformed? ive played with almost all distros
sorry to hear that you're not familiar with the stock expression
just reading things literally :) its fun
not really; sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade should get you there
